subject: svn commit: samba-web r1104 - in trunk: .
body:
Author: jerry
Date: 2007-04-22 22:10:34 +0000 (Sun, 22 Apr 2007)
New Revision: 1104

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-web&rev=1104

Log:
fix typo in release announcement reported by Miguel Medalha 
Modified:
   trunk/index.html


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/index.html
===================================================================
--- trunk/index.html	2007-04-22 11:27:29 UTC (rev 1103)
+++ trunk/index.html	2007-04-22 22:10:34 UTC (rev 1104)
@@ -22,7 +22,7 @@
     22 Apr 2007
Samba 3.0.25rc2 Available for Download
 
-    Samba 3.0.25rc2 is now available for download.  This is the first
+    Samba 3.0.25rc2 is now available for download.  This is the second
     release candidate of the next upgrade production release version
     of Samba.  An RC release means that the version is close to the
     final production release, but there may be a few lingering bugs.
